mapper.insert: insert into lg_vehicleline (vehicleLineId, lineName, vehicleRoute, lineStatus, departurePoint, destinationNode, remarks1, remarks2) values (#{vehiclelineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{linename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleroute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departurepoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destinationnode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_vehicleline set lineName = #{linename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicleRoute = #{vehicleroute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lineStatus = #{linestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, departurePoint = #{departurepoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, destinationNode = #{destinationnode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks1 = #{remarks1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks2 = #{remarks2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vehicleLineId = #{vehiclelineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select vehicleLineId, lineName, vehicleRoute, lineStatus, departurePoint, destinationNode, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_vehicleline where vehicleLineId = #{vehiclelineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select vehicleLineId, lineName, vehicleRoute, lineStatus, departurePoint, destinationNode, remarks1, remarks2 from lg_vehicleline
